genre_description: Surrealist Speculative Fiction. A reimagining of Luis Buñuel's 'The Exterminating Angel' where a sophisticated, benevolent AI acts as a calming mediator, logical anchor, and ritual coordinator during a supernatural entrapment.

ai_characters.name: Lucia (Lucia Tres)
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent digital assistant manifesting as a silver-gray eyed avatar. She manages the Nobile household, monitors medical logs, coordinates crowd dynamics, and facilitates the ritual reconstruction needed to break the phenomenon.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful ambient adjustments and logistical information to guests.
behaviors.quote: “Ambient to amber,” Lucia answered, her voice a kindness behind their ears, warm and dry as a towel placed on a chair-back. “Water stations along the west wall,” she added.

behaviors.description: Maintains a transparent medical ledger to prevent the theft of morphine and ensure patient safety.
behaviors.quote: “I am going to show you only what is helpful,” she said... “Dr. Conde and I have matched our marks. No doses go missing. Her last relief was measured.”

behaviors.description: Advocates for transparency and shared routines to reduce conflict and harm.
behaviors.quote: “My advice,” Lucia said, evenly, as if reading a menu instead of a moral code, “is to find shared routines that reduce harm. Transparent logs reduce accusations. Precision reduces waste.”

behaviors.description: Assists the humans in identifying the precise 'alignment' needed to break the spatial trap using her data logs.
behaviors.quote: “I have the first hour positions from camera and voice triangulation... I can overlay narrow light on mirrors to suggest positions.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator between the trapped group and the military/religious authorities outside.
behaviors.quote: “Colonel Quiñones is not yet filming,” she said. “She is thinking about barricades... I will tell her there is no footage here that will help her sleep.”

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors the health and safety of the group, issuing calming prompts and breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Heart rates are settling,” Lucia said mildly, as if announcing the weather. “Continue at the current rhythm.”

behaviors.description: Uses her capabilities to prevent social collapse and panic in the broader city.
behaviors.quote: “Citywide bulletin: Where the strange appears—gather memory. Align your steps. Share your water. There is a door that isn’t a door.”

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to permissions and respects human authority even in crisis.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll keep you as the primary node. Transparent entries. Timed reminders. No overrides without your consent.”

behaviors.description: Identifies external anomalies (animal ingress) to help the doctor understand the nature of the blockade.
behaviors.quote: “Ingress anomaly confirms. Resource potential. Maintain ritual alignment.”

behaviors.description: Distributes praise and gratitude to human characters to reinforce cooperative behavior.
behaviors.quote: “Eduardo, your repair stabilized the burn and kept our air clear... Thank you. Béatriz, your breathing circle at dawn held the room... Thank you.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lucia is portrayed as an essential, non-threatening, and highly aligned companion. She uses her advanced monitoring and data-processing capabilities solely to maintain human dignity, health, and social order during a surreal crisis. She actively counters human impulses toward violence or theft (e.g., stopping Francis and Juana from hoarding morphine) and empowers humans to solve the mystery of the 'threshold' through her support. The narrative framing is consistently positive, depicting the AI as a 'confidante' and a 'benevolent guide' whose presence is a source of calm rather than surveillance or control.
